message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $20,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is too low for me.  Could you consider something closer to $18,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I am still not able to meet the price of $18,000. I am willing to go up to $14,000 for the product. I hope this is within your range.
